Title: P. Leconte 7
Description: Fragment of papyrus inscribed in Demotic with part of a documentary text containing a reference to the Roman Emperor Marcus Julius Philippus. = P. Leconte 7.
Curator's comments: See D. Bonneau et al. Les Papyrus Leconte, Actes de XVe Congres international de papyrologie III (1979), 25-6; also P. Leconte I in RdE 30 (1978). This is the most recent Demotic known. Devauchelle (pers. comm. 6.2000) notes that Leconte bought the papyri from R. Lambert who published a Lexique hieroglyphique chez Geuthner in 1925. Lambert had a military career; Devauchelle suggests that he may have bought the papyri before WWII quand il etait en exercice et interesse par l'Egypte. To be published by Devauchelle.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380693) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380693)
